long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doggone It! changes all pictures of any website the user specifies containing a specific word to pictures of dogs. 

Tired of politics? Just enter in the names of the politicians you don't want to see and the websites you don't want to see them on.

These websites and words can be configured by the user in the options setting, but defaults to several news websites and politicians.
